data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes and new records of the genus Sphingonaepiopsis Wallengren, 1858 (Lepidoptera: Sphingidae) in Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kitching, Ian J., Zahiri, Reza (2007): Taxonomic notes and new records of the genus Sphingonaepiopsis Wallengren, 1858 (Lepidoptera: Sphingidae) in Iran. Zootaxa 1610: 41-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178914
